GSD.description:
Bluetooth: use memset avoid memory leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 42b6a39f439b6f37cc2024d91ce547d83290ff78. For more details please see the references link.
